variable.name: agecat
variable.description: 5-year age category (for each value of agecat, agecat <= studyage < agecat+5; in analyses, agecat= 80, 85, 90 [years] were lumped into one category.)

variable.name: aoo
variable.description: Participant's age at time of T2D diagnosis (in years)

variable.name: studyage
variable.description: Participant's age at study exam (in years)

variable.name: T2D affection status
variable.description: T2D cases were identified using WHO 1999 criteria of fasting plasma glucose >/=7.0 mmol/l or 2-h plasma glucose >/=11.1 mmol/l, by report of diabetes medication use, or based on medical record review. NGT controls were identified using WHO 1999 criteria of fasting plasma glucose <6.1 mmol/l and 2-h plasma glucose <7.8 mmol/l.
